headline: Ask HN: Personal LinkedIn Replacement?
description:
Hey.

Long story short, I think something went wrong in my LinkedIn profile was temporarily restricted ( I don't think I did anything unusual, but who knows what happened ). MS wants me to submit my ID, which I won't do for several different reasons, but it is not why I am here. I am seeing it as an opportunity. Yeah, that profile was substantial and so on, but why can't I recreate it as my own space/website? It is mostly there to for HR/recruiters anyway..

I guess the question is. How do you guys do it ( show off your online presence )? Simple website? Blog? Github?

Thank you in advance,
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 个人LinkedIn的替代品？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 個人LinkedIn的替代品？
description_zh-Hans:
嘿。

长话短说，我想在我的LinkedIn个人资料被暂时限制时出了点问题（我不认为我做了什么不寻常的事，但谁知道发生了什么）。MS要我提交我的ID，出于几个不同的原因，我不会这么做，但这不是我在这里的原因。我把它看作是一个机会。是的，那份资料很重要，等等，但为什么我不能把它作为我自己的空间/网站重新创建？反正它主要是为人力资源/招聘人员服务的。

我想问题是。你们是怎么做的（炫耀你们的网上形象）？简单的网站？博客？Github？

提前感谢您。
description_zh-Hant:

提前感謝您。
